title: I accompanied my best friend today. A very anxious and uncertainty filled morning. In the end, I thanked...

attachments.displayName:
I accompanied my best friend today. A very anxious and uncertainty filled morning. In the end, I thanked Jesus for the silent blessing. And in the end, I am joyful that cancer has not affected another loved one in my life.

Friendship In the Depths
By Letha McGarity 2013
Friendship in the Depths,
That's what we gave.

Memories and unknowns,
We waste none and all we save.

Our love swims, looking toward the light.
You will not go too deep for I will hold your hand with all my might.


Photo source: +Dr Dean Kos Thank you for this inspiring underwater photography. (I've been waiting for the right moment to put it to good use and I found it today.)

object.content:
